assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: SERAKU Co., Ltd. engages in the design, construction, development, and operation of IT infrastructures in Japan. It operates through four segments: System Integration, Digital Transformation, Midori Cloud, and Mechanical Design and Engineering. The System Integration segment offers IT infrastructure and cloud technologies, business domains, digital creative, web operations, and web system development services. The Digital Transformation segment engages in the construction and operation of cloud systems and the deployment of cyber security solutions to protect corporate information assets; and the provision of support services for the use of Salesforce. The Midori Cloud segment provides a platform service, including Midori cloud and farm cloud to support the digital transformation of the agriculture, livestock, and fisheries sectors; and solution services to solve individual issues. The Mechanical Design and Engineering segment is involved in the engineer dispatch, commissioned contracting, and engineer training activities for the design and development of CAD and drafting technology, as well as the design of machines, and dies and other items for various companies. It also provides paid job placement and temporary staffing and IT engineers training services. SERAKU Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
